title: The Remaining Land and Benjaminâ€™s Inheritance
summary: Joshua 18 recounts how the remaining land is divided at Shiloh. Seven tribes still need their allotments, so Joshua sends out surveyors. The chapter also lists the territory assigned to the tribe of Benjamin.

faq.question: Where is the tabernacle set up?
faq.answer: At Shiloh, where the land division is completed.

faq.question: What tribe receives land in this chapter?
